channel.title: The Sky
channel.description: Images of the sky: planetary or lunar conjunctions, occultations, constellations, aurorae, star trails, and more!

item.title: Moon-Venus conjunction. 5/19/07
item.description: Conjunction of the crescent moon with Venus on 5/19 2007.
item.media:description: Conjunction of the crescent moon with Venus on 5/19 2007.

item.title: Perseus with Comet Holmes
item.description: The classical outline of the Perseus constellation. The bright, extended object was Comet Holmes in Nov 1, 2007. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT on a tripod.
item.media:description: The classical outline of the Perseus constellation. The bright, extended object was Comet Holmes in Nov 1, 2007. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT on a tripod.

item.title: Cassiopeia and Perseus.
item.description: This picture contains the constellations Cassiopeia (top right), Andromeda(left), and Perseus (bottom right). Taken on 9/12/10 with the Canon Digital Rebel XT. 30 sec, it is slightly out of focus but this accentuates the colors of stars.
item.media:description: This picture contains the constellations Cassiopeia (top right), Andromeda(left), and Perseus (bottom right). Taken on 9/12/10 with the Canon Digital Rebel XT. 30 sec, it is slightly out of focus but this accentuates the colors of stars.

item.title: "Supermoon" rising at ONU.
item.description: The full moon rising over the ONU campus, during the March 19, 2011 "supermoon". This happens when the full moon occurs at perigee, and the Moon is closest to the Earth in its orbit. The March 19 supermoon appeared almost 20% brighter and 15% larger than the average full moon. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT.
item.media:description: The full moon rising over the ONU campus, during the March 19, 2011 "supermoon". This happens when the full moon occurs at perigee, and the Moon is closest to the Earth in its orbit. The March 19 supermoon appeared almost 20% brighter and 15% larger than the average full moon. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT.

item.title: Green aurora
item.description: Aurora borealis looking due north from the ONU Campus. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.
item.media:description: Aurora borealis looking due north from the ONU Campus. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.

item.title: Green auroral bands.
item.description: Green aurora to the north-northeast from the ONU Observatory. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.
item.media:description: Green aurora to the north-northeast from the ONU Observatory. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.

item.title: Green auroral bands with airplane
item.description: Green aurorals bands with airplane. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.
item.media:description: Green aurorals bands with airplane. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.

item.title: The Big Dipper and green aurora borealis.
item.description: The Big Dipper and green aurora borealis taken from the south side of the ONU Observatory. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.
item.media:description: The Big Dipper and green aurora borealis taken from the south side of the ONU Observatory. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.

item.title: Great aurora of 10/24/11 near its peak.
item.description: The aurora was showing rapidly changing "curtains" in red during the peak of the great display of 10/24/11. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT, 20 sec exposure at ISO 200.
item.media:description: The aurora was showing rapidly changing "curtains" in red during the peak of the great display of 10/24/11. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT, 20 sec exposure at ISO 200.

item.title: Red aurora near the peak of the display of 10/24/11.
item.description: Red and green aurora above roof of ONU Observatory. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.
item.media:description: Red and green aurora above roof of ONU Observatory. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.

item.title: Red and green aurora over the observatory.
item.description: Red and green aurora over the observatory. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT, 13 sec exposure. During the great display of 10/24/11.
item.media:description: Red and green aurora over the observatory. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT, 13 sec exposure. During the great display of 10/24/11.

item.title: Green auroral "curtains" with the Big Dipper.
item.description: Green auroral curtains seen with Big Dipper in the back ground. Red aurora is seen at higher altitudes corresponding to charged solar wind particles streaming down on our location. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.
item.media:description: Green auroral curtains seen with Big Dipper in the back ground. Red aurora is seen at higher altitudes corresponding to charged solar wind particles streaming down on our location. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.

item.title: Red and green makes yellow!
item.description: Overlapping curtains of red and green emission makes a yellow aurora. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.
item.media:description: Overlapping curtains of red and green emission makes a yellow aurora. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT. During the great display of 10/24/11.

item.title: Corona Borealis and Arcturus.
item.description: This photo has the constellation Corona Borealis (the curved U-shape in the lower half of the photo) and the bright star Arcturus in the constellation Bootes (top and right). From 1/4/12.
item.media:description: This photo has the constellation Corona Borealis (the curved U-shape in the lower half of the photo) and the bright star Arcturus in the constellation Bootes (top and right). From 1/4/12.

item.title: Stars and Clouds
item.description: A GIF animation of stars and clouds in the night sky. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT on 1/4/12.
item.media:description: A GIF animation of stars and clouds in the night sky. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT on 1/4/12.

item.title: Big Dipper Star trail
item.description: A long exposure photograph of Ursa Major, showing how the stars rotate around the north celestial pole. In the lower left of the photo, note that stars much closer to the pole move very little. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT.
item.media:description: A long exposure photograph of Ursa Major, showing how the stars rotate around the north celestial pole. In the lower left of the photo, note that stars much closer to the pole move very little. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT.

item.title: Orion above the ONU Observatory.
item.description: The constellation Orion, with the corner of the ONU Observatory helpfully pointing to the bright blue star Rigel. Also visible are Orion's belt of three stars, in the center; Betelgeuse, a red supergiant in the center top of the photo; Sirius, the bright star on the left in Canis Major; the Orion Nebula, visible as a group of stars making up Orion's "sword" under his belt; and Taurus, a constellation shaped like a V and marked by the bright orange star Aldebaran on the right. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT.
item.media:description: The constellation Orion, with the corner of the ONU Observatory helpfully pointing to the bright blue star Rigel. Also visible are Orion's belt of three stars, in the center; Betelgeuse, a red supergiant in the center top of the photo; Sirius, the bright star on the left in Canis Major; the Orion Nebula, visible as a group of stars making up Orion's "sword" under his belt; and Taurus, a constellation shaped like a V and marked by the bright orange star Aldebaran on the right. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT.

item.title: Jupiter and Venus together.
item.description: Conjunction of Jupiter and Venus on Mar 13, 2012, with some Astronomy Club members observing with the 8-inch Meade.
item.media:description: Conjunction of Jupiter and Venus on Mar 13, 2012, with some Astronomy Club members observing with the 8-inch Meade.

item.title: Sunset Clouds
item.description: A GIF animation of the clouds passing over as the sun sets, with a wind turbine in the background. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT on 8/3/13.
item.media:description: A GIF animation of the clouds passing over as the sun sets, with a wind turbine in the background. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT on 8/3/13.

item.title: Cassiopeia Star Trail
item.description: Cassiopeia star trail. The spottiness of the trails reveal that clouds were passing during the exposure. About 4.2 minute exposure time with the Digital Rebel XT on a tripod.
item.media:description: Cassiopeia star trail. The spottiness of the trails reveal that clouds were passing during the exposure. About 4.2 minute exposure time with the Digital Rebel XT on a tripod.
